plugin.name: tcp
plugin.description: transfer data over the network via TCP

element.name: multifdsink
element.author: Thomas Vander Stichele <thomas at apestaart dot org>, Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: tcpclientsink
element.description: Send data as a client over the network via TCP
element.author: Thomas Vander Stichele <thomas at apestaart dot org>

element.name: tcpclientsrc
element.description: Receive data as a client over the network via TCP
element.author: Thomas Vander Stichele <thomas at apestaart dot org>

element.name: tcpserversink
element.description: Send data as a server over the network via TCP
element.author: Thomas Vander Stichele <thomas at apestaart dot org>

element.name: tcpserversrc
element.description: Receive data as a server over the network via TCP
element.author: Thomas Vander Stichele <thomas at apestaart dot org>
